personal.name: Harmen Dark
personal.title: Cloud Architect ¬∑ AI Engineer ¬∑ Technical Lead
personal.description: I build scalable AI-driven cloud systems that solve hard business problems. I specialize in AWS, LLMs, and full-stack product delivery from concept to scale.

about.description: Cloud and AI Engineering Lead with over 12 years of experience architecting scalable full-stack systems and cloud-native infrastructure. Proven record delivering high-impact software using AWS, LLMs, React, and automation for startups, enterprises, and governments.

projects.title: Nucleus Narrate & Nucleus Go
projects.description: Financial reporting and mobile portfolio management platform built using React, Material UI, and React Native. Delivered multi-platform support, clean design, and secure functionality.

projects.title: Archax Digital Asset Exchange Dashboards
projects.description: Engineered compliant trading dashboards using OpenFin, FDC3, and D3.js. Streamlined regulatory workflows and automated updates via AWS.

projects.title: Krunch.ai NFT Marketplace
projects.description: Built white-label marketplace front-end using Next.js and Solana smart contracts. Integrated decentralized storage and identity solutions.

projects.title: Global SaaS Platform for Entertainment Partners
projects.description: Architected a cloud-based SaaS platform with multilingual and multi-tenant support for a global media organization.

projects.title: Restaurant Brands Apps & Infrastructure
projects.description: Delivered cross-platform mobile apps and services for Burger King, Popeyes, and Tim Hortons across regions.

experience.title: Senior Software Engineer
experience.description: Architected and delivered a high-performance React Native app with NFC and Wallet integrations. Focused on modularity, security, and cloud-native delivery using AWS.

experience.title: Senior Software Engineer (Contract)
experience.description: Rebuilt SCP RECAP UI and backend APIs using Spring Boot, AWS Lambda, and API Gateway. Delivered a responsive, scalable system for merchant tools.

experience.title: Technical Lead
experience.description: Delivered a global SaaS platform and high-throughput payment system using Python, React, and AWS for Entertainment Partners and Restaurant Brands.

experience.title: Senior Software Engineer
experience.description: Engineered FDC3-compliant dashboards for digital asset trading. Delivered secure cloud deployments and streamlined regulatory UX flows.

experience.title: Senior Software Engineer
